Tiles.Text: If it is ethically and environmentally wrong to eat meat, you shouldn't eat meat.
Meat producers cause unnecessary pain for animals.
If an action puts animals in unnecessary pain, then it is unethical.
It takes a lot of food to raise an animal.
Wasting resources is bad for the environment.
Raising an animal for meat provides a relatively small amount of food.
Because raising animals takes more food than it provides, raising animals for meat wastes resources.
Because raising animals for meat wastes resources and wasting resources is bad for the environment, eating meat is wrong environmentally.
